00039 MetadataNormal::MetadataNormal(TableIdentifier *identifier, std::string &end_row) : m_files_scanner_ptr(0) {
00040   m_metadata_key = std::string("") + (uint32_t)identifier->id + ":" + end_row;
00041 }

00048 MetadataNormal::~MetadataNormal() {
00049   m_files_scanner_ptr = 0;

00054 void MetadataNormal::reset_files_scan() {
00055   ScanSpec scan_spec;
00056   RowInterval ri;
00057 
00058   scan_spec.row_limit = 1;
00059   scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00060   ri.start = m_metadata_key.c_str();
00061   ri.end   = m_metadata_key.c_str();
00062   scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00063   scan_spec.columns.clear();
00064   scan_spec.columns.push_back("Files");
00065 
00066   m_files_scanner_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071 bool MetadataNormal::get_next_files(std::string &ag_name, std::string &files) {
00072   Cell cell;
00073 
00074   assert(m_files_scanner_ptr);
00075 
00076   if (m_files_scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00077     assert(!strcmp(cell.column_family, "Files"));
00078     ag_name = std::string(cell.column_qualifier);
00079     files = std::string((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00080     return true;
00081   }
00082 
00083   m_files_scanner_ptr = 0;
00084   return false;
00085 }

00088 
00089 void MetadataNormal::write_files(std::string &ag_name, std::string &files) {
00090   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00091   KeySpec key;
00092 
00093   mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00094 
00095   key.row = m_metadata_key.c_str();
00096   key.row_len = m_metadata_key.length();
00097   key.column_family = "Files";
00098   key.column_qualifier = ag_name.c_str();
00099   key.column_qualifier_len = ag_name.length();
00100   mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00101   mutator_ptr->flush();
00102 }
